entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 60 this morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 26 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Local blowing snow this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing early in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
